shapes

Class Shape3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • shapes.Shape
      • shapes.Shape3D
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlatonicSolid, Sphere

    public abstract class Shape3D
extends Shape
    An abstract class Shape3D. Extends Shape. A direct parent of all three-dimensional shape classes.

      • volume

        public abstract double volume()
        An abstract method for computing the volume of the shape.
        Returns:
        volume of the 3d shape

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides toString() from class Shape. Adds information about the volume of the 3D shape. Format: The name of the shape, 1 tab, the area (formatted so that it only shows two digits after the decimal point), 1 tab, the volume (formatted so that it only shows two digits after the decimal point).
        Overrides:
        toString in class Shape
        Returns:
        String
